creator: massdosage@gmail.com
text:
I recently found a need to do symmetric key generation and file encryption and
decryption using this key as part of my build tasks. I couldn't find an ant core
task or optional task to do this. So, I have written my own, I am willing to
donate this task to the ant project if you are interested. I will also document
it and do whatever you deem necessary to make it "production" level. If you do
not feel this should be incorporated into a future version of Ant please let me
know and then I will just make the code available on my website for others to
use from there.
